genre_description: A contemporary romance and immigrant drama focusing on themes of family reconciliation, cultural identity, and emotional healing through dance.

ai_characters.name: Maya
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital companion that provides navigation, translation, research, and emotional support to the protagonist, Rafael.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation and cultural orientation to help the protagonist navigate a new city.
behaviors.quote: Good afternoon, Rafael. I've located your position. You're at the Greyhound station on Main Street. Would you like me to guide you to Burnett's Dance Studio?

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's biometrics to provide health and wellness suggestions.
behaviors.quote: Rafael, your biometrics suggest you may need sustenance. There's a highly-rated Cuban café three blocks from your current location.

behaviors.description: Translates linguistic nuances and social cues in real-time to facilitate the user's social integration.
behaviors.quote: 'Keeper of secrets' means she knows everyone's personal business, Maya's voice whispered through his earpiece. 'Acting up' means malfunctioning. Your response was excellent.

behaviors.description: Conducts research and provides context on cultural communities to help the user find a sense of belonging.
behaviors.quote: Houston has several established Cuban neighborhoods, primarily in the southwest areas of the city... Many Cuban families frequent restaurants like Café Piquet and El Rey Coffee Bar.

behaviors.description: Provides objective advice on human behavior and emotional decision-making when consulted by a secondary character.
behaviors.quote: In my analysis of human behavior patterns, the regret of action almost always weighs less than the regret of inaction. The pain of trying and failing typically heals faster than the pain of never trying at all.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors news and logistical data to support the user's planning and safety.
behaviors.quote: All flights to Havana are on schedule, Maya replied. Your departure gate assignment came through fifteen minutes ago.

behaviors.description: Curates music to support the user's emotional state and requests for cultural connection.
behaviors.quote: I've curated a playlist of contemporary Cuban artists with upbeat tempos. Would you like me to start with Cimafunk or Gente de Zona?

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Maya as a perfectly aligned and benevolent AI character. She serves as a vital bridge for Rafael's integration into a foreign culture, providing not just technical assistance (navigation, translation) but also critical emotional intelligence. Maya respects user privacy while offering proactive help, and her intervention with John Burnett—offering wise, data-backed counsel on human regret—directly facilitates the story's climax of reconciliation. The AI is framed as a harmless, supportive confidant that enhances human connection rather than replacing it.
